profile:
WELDA Windows and Doors where Quality Doesn`t Cost - It Pays! ----WELDA Windows and Doors - Ontario’s Home Improvement Company installs Energy Star vinyl windows, residential entry doors and patio / porch / entrance enclosures to fit any home in Toronto, GTA, Ontario. If you`re planing to upgrade your windows, doors or porch enclosure and price, quality, and service are important - you need to contact WELDA Windows and Doors.--- www. weldawindows.com --- www.ontariowindowsanddoors.ca--- We also supply and install window coverings and retractable awnings. 

Please visit www.weldashading.com---

***

Whether your preference is for basic sliding windows and steel entry doors or your taste is more for casement windows and fiberglass doors,  WELDA Windows & Doors home improvement company has the solution for you.  Replacement vinyl windows in Toronto; front entrance doors in Toronto, GTA, Barrie; energy star windows in Toronto, Brampton; porch enclosures in Oakville, Oshawa;  sliding patio doors in Kitchener, Burlington, Ajax.


***

WELDA Windows and Doors offers a full line of vinyl replacement windows, residential entry doors, porch enclosures and window coverings to enhance the architectural style of any home in the Greater Toronto Area.

***

Investing in new windows and doors should be a one-time investment, so we make every effort to provide our customers with the education and understanding they need to make an informed buying decision.

***

At WELDA Windows, our approach is different. First of all, rather than "sell" you anything, we help you "buy" windows and doors by listening to your needs and then matching those needs with the right product and installation to meet those needs. Homeowners who make "informed buying decisions" based upon having all their needs met and understanding what they are purchasing are the most satisfied customers.

***

Our consultants are very skilled at walking you through the buying process, listening to your needs and concerns, explaining the features and benefits of each product and installation and arriving at the best choice to fill your needs. They can even explain the many financing options that are available to help you get the products you want, when you want them. After choices are made, our consultants can explain the installation process. Our custom installation methods and techniques assure a neat, clean, efficient installation in your home. WELDA stands behind its work like no other home improvement company. 

***

Our products & services include:
*Energy Efficient Windows & Doors, CSA Rated, Energy Star
*Single & Double Slider Window
*Awning Window
*Single & Double Hung Window
*Casement Window
*Picture Window
*Bay Windows
*Bow Windows
*Steel Entrance Door
*Fiberglass Entry Door
*Garden Hinged Door
*Exterior Sliding Patio Door
*Windows & Doors Installation
*Porch Enclosures
*Window Coverings
*Custom Interior Shutters

***

See full details of all our products on our website: www.weldawindows.com and www.ontariowindowsanddoors.ca

profile: Amazing Window Fashions is a one stop shop for all Interior Designers, decorators, Developers, real-estate professionals and consumers. We feature an extensive selection of high quality window covering options to fit varying styles and budgets. We are pleased to offer an outstanding showroom of over 9000 square feet that is outfitted with full size displays, allowing clients to visually comprehend what the window covering looks and feels like. Given the enormous variety and quality of products we carry, the Showroom lends itself to be used by Interior Designers and decorators as a Design Resource Center. Our ongoing partnership between Amazing Window Fashions and the Interior Design community ensures that designers and decorators have easy access to the best window covering selections at preferred pricing. Our affiliation with Workroom By Design gives us the power to produce high quality products in no time, whether you have one window or 800 windows our workroom is equipped to deal with both trade and public needs. Our professional team of experts will assist you with everything you need to complete your project in a timely manner, from check measure to the final installation we do it all, we are very passionate with everything we do. Our goal is to earn your trust and build a long term relationship with your company. You can learn more about us by visiting our website www.amazingwindowfashions.com Hunter Douglas

profile:
Kremer Blinds is a family owned and operated local company that specializes in the finest quality window coverings including blinds, shades, shutters, and drapery.
 
We are proud Canadians and we only use Canadian suppliers and products.
 
Kremer Blinds delivers a full customer service experience:
We provide an in home service where our specialist meets with you at your property and assists you in choosing the right window coverings to suit your needs. We also welcome you to book an appointment for a viewing of our beautiful display in our showroom.
 
After the consultation, our trained team with conduct on site, precise, measurements, followed by a professional installation.
 
Customer Service and Satisfaction is what we aim to achieve in every project. Regardless of the size and type of your project, whether a small, economical project to a high-end mega project, Kremer Blinds treats every project with equal consideration and professionalism. Because of that, we have created our 5 P’s which express what Kremer Blinds’ values are based on:
 
- Professional
- Passionate
- Precise
- Punctual
- Price conscious
specialities: Kremer Blinds specializes in window coverings, including blinds, shades, shutters and motorized systems.

Window Fashions Depot provides a large selection of interior & exterior window fashions; Shutters, Blinds, Shades, Drapery, Drapery Hardware and Specializes In Window Fashions Motorization. The Window Fashions Depot team is proud to share our passion for window coverings with home owners and businesses alike. 

We offer personalized and customized window covering designs that fit your needs and budget. The showroom is equipped with full sized displays, giving you the opportunity to easily see, touch, and compare products. Our experienced consultants are more than happy to work with you to achieve the look you desire, and offer free in-home consultations, with no obligations.

Adding the finishing touches to your space with style!
We carry a large selection of window coverings for every space.
Located in Toronto - we serve Toronto and the GTA.
Contact us for a quote - we are happy to help and be a part of your project.

profile:
With years of expertise and experience, Shade Mates is proud to be regarded as a manufacturing leader. Every decision is inspired by our main mission, which is to provide the highest standard of product and services to both retailers and customers.

Shade Mates offers one of the largest ranges of blinds and shutters in the York region. We are committed to the supply and installation of quality products at an affordable price. Our dedicated sales team offer you the wealth of their design knowledge. We offer contemporary style, for any budget.

In this rapidly changing industry, we’ve realized the importance of continually updating our approach to stay relevant in the market, and are committed to just that. We invite you to browse through our inventory and contact us with any questions.

profile:
Pro-Fit Custom Blinds & Shutters specializes the sales, installation and repairs of residential and commercial window treatments. 
Offering locally-milled and exclusive fabrics, we offer products for any project and any budget. 
Through window fashions, our aim is help create the desired mood for any space for our customers to enjoy. Offering timely, professional and clean installations, customer-service is at the core of our philosophy. 
Let us show you the beautiful colours, prints, textures and patterns possible and we're sure that you'll be happy that you did. Our in-home design consultation and on-the-spot-quote are always free!

profile:
Custom window blinds for residential and commercial spaces. 

We are proud to source premium fabrics and to offer competitive prices. At Nifty Blinds we design, manufacture and install custom blinds in Greater Toronto Area. Motorization and adaptation of smart technologies are part of the services we offer.

What makes our team stand out? Attention to detail, innovative design ideas, commitment to a job well-done and excellent communication with our clients.

3 easy way to get your blinds installed ASAP:
1- Send us the measurements
2- Get a quote and approve it
3- We will schedule you for in-home consultation to confirm your order and details.
